column4: News;Phnom Penh: A Chinese man died in Yeap Heang Hotel
column7: 2018 at 6:40 am.------Police say the dead man was Luo Qiang
column8: a 30-year-old staying in Kong Pisey district
column10: the woman woke up and demanded money to go home. But the man was dead and covered in blemishes.------According to a biopsy expert
column11: he died of a heart attack and was taken to Russian hospital to wait for a relative to come.------http://khmeread.com/posts/36020
